article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for C WS Core
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating from GT4.0
section.para: No migration info is necessary from GT 4.0

section.title: Migrating from GT3
section.para: The C WS-Core is a new component of GT4. No migration from GT3 exists.

section.title: Migrating from GT2
section.para: The C WS-Core is a new component of GT4. No migration from GT2 exists.
